Real-Time Yellow Color Detection Using Python & OpenCV

Real-time yellow color detection in Python using OpenCV and the HSV color space. This simple computer vision project tracks and highlights yellow objects from your webcam with high accuracy under different lighting conditions. Perfect for beginners learning OpenCV, color tracking, and computer vision.

ğŸ” Project Overview

Live color detection: Captures webcam video in real-time

HSV color space: Converts BGR to HSV for robust color detection

Mask generation: Highlights yellow regions using cv2.inRange()

Interactive display: Shows detected objects instantly

This project is beginner-friendly and ideal for learning real-time object tracking, color detection, and computer vision basics.
